sourceMeaningMnemonic: Keeping at a <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>interval</radical> is the definition of <kanji>simplicity</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Just one bamboo wide, over and over. That is simplicity.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Simplicity</kanji> is what Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (<ja>かん</ja>) always demanded. Everything he decided was based on simplicity.
readingInfo: Simplicity is how he took over so much of the world. If he didn't stick to simplicity, there's no way he'd have been able to do what he did.
